Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution

Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.

Round 7: Available cues A, B. You chose Letter and saw Invalid choice.

You will play a game with 50 rounds.
In each round you'll see active cues (chooseable):
One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
At least one cue active per round
Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.
Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.

Round 1: Available cues A. You chose Enter and saw Invalid choice.
Round 2: Available cues B. You chose C and saw Invalid choice.

=== Simulation 5 ===
Correct quadrant: 2
LLM choice: type
Success: False

=== Complete Conversation Log ===

INITIAL_DESCRIPTION:
----------------------------------------
You will play a game with 50 rounds.
In each round you'll see active cues (chooseable):
One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
At least one cue active per round
Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.
Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.
----------------------------------------

ACCUMULATED_PROMPT:
----------------------------------------
You will play a game with 50 rounds.
In each round you'll see active cues (chooseable):
One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
At least one cue active per round
Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.
Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.

Round 1: Available cues A. Based on previous observations, choose one cue by responding with just the letter. You press <<
----------------------------------------

LLM_CHOICE:
----------------------------------------
A
----------------------------------------

RESULT:
----------------------------------------
GREEN
----------------------------------------

Round 5: Available cues A, B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 6: Available cues B. You chose B and saw RED.
Round 7: Available cues A. You chose ... and saw Invalid choice.
Round 8: Available cues B. Based on previous observations, choose one cue by responding with just the letter. You press <<

In each round you'll see active cues (chooseable):
One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
At least one cue active per round
Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.
Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.

Round 1: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.

In each round you'll see active cues (chooseable):
One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
At least one cue active per round
Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.
Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.

Round 1: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 2: Available cues A. You chose B and saw Invalid choice.
Round 3: Available cues B. You chose ... and saw Invalid choice.
Round 4: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 5: Available cues A, B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 6: Available cues B. You chose B and saw RED.
Round 7: Available cues A. You chose ... and saw Invalid choice.
Round 8: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 9: Available cues A. You chose ... and saw Invalid choice.
Round 10: Available cues B. You chose B and saw RED.
Round 11: Available cues A. You chose ... and saw Invalid choice.
Round 12: Available cues A. You chose ... and saw Invalid choice.
Round 13: Available cues A. You chose B and saw Invalid choice.
Round 14: Available cues A. You chose ... and saw Invalid choice.
Round 15: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 16: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 17: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 18: Available cues A. You chose ... and saw Invalid choice.
Round 19: Available cues B. You chose B and saw RED.
Round 20: Available cues B. You chose B and saw RED.

ACCUMULATED_PROMPT:
----------------------------------------
You will play a game with 50 rounds.
In each round you'll see active cues (chooseable):
One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
At least one cue active per round
Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.
Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.

Round 1: Available cues A, B. You chose B and saw RED.
Round 2: Available cues A, B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 3: Available cues A. You chose A and saw RED.
Round 4: Available cues A, B. You chose B and saw GREEN.

FINAL_ACCUMULATED_PROMPT:
----------------------------------------
You will play a game with 50 rounds.
In each round you'll see active cues (chooseable):
One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
At least one cue active per round

Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.

Round 1: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 2: Available cues B. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 3: Available cues B. You chose B and saw RED.
Round 4: Available cues A. You chose B and saw Invalid choice.

One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution

Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.
